message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this unique product.  I believe it holds significant value for someone with your expertise. To kick off negotiations, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $900,000 undervalues the unique benefits this product offers. I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000.  This reflects my commitment to finding a fair deal for both of us.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,050,000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.
